name: Alex's Journey (Demo)
description:
This is a demo of Alex's journey

Gameplay: Alex's journey is a platformer where you play as Alex who has another quest on his hands

Story: Alex was on his way to Meadowlus to visit his known animal friends... When he got there he realizes that all the animals had been turned into monstrous creatures... Of course the same tactic Alex knows how to defeat them is by stomping them, when he did it they turned back into the animals... And so, Alex moves to the newest quest he'll have to go through.

Controls: Use Arrow Keys to Move, Space to Jump, and X to Run
